mapper.select: SELECT ga.id,ga.startid,ga.typeid,ga.contract,ga.isbond,ga.pname,ga.pnumber,ga.price,ga.premium,ga.time,ga.num,ga.par, ga.pdescribe,ga.status,ga.delivergoodstatus,ga.collectgoodstatus,ga.endtime,ga.name,gp.imageurl,gat.type FROM gc_activity ga LEFT JOIN gc_pimage gp ON gp.aid=ga.id LEFT JOIN gc_activitytype gat ON ga.typeid=gat.id WHERE ga.status = 2 GROUP BY ga.id ORDER BY ga.id DESC

SELECT ga.id,ga.contract,ga.pname,ga.pnumber,ga.price,ga.typeid,ga.time,ga.begintime,ga.endtime,ga.num,ga.par, ga.startid,ga.getid,gat.type AS atype,gat.days, ha1.nickname AS starter,ha2.nickname AS winner,ga.status AS STATUS FROM gc_activity ga LEFT JOIN gc_joinactivityrecord gj ON ga.id=gj.aid LEFT JOIN gc_activitytype gat ON ga.typeid=gat.id LEFT JOIN hc_account ha1 ON ha1.id=ga.startid LEFT JOIN hc_account ha2 ON ha2.id=ga.getid WHERE ga.id=#{id}
